channel.title: Operating systems
channel.description:
Hey guys, So my friend with the processor wants to know if Windows 8 Will run faster then Windows vista Home Premium.... Personally i like windows 7 but he wants windows 8.. He said "Everytime I try to run skype and a game at the same time. It lags really bad, And at some points it just freezes." At the moment he only has 1gb of ram. What would be a faster op system?
[spoiler]And i swear if one of you say windows xp, I'll kill you[/spoiler]

item.title: Operating systems
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[code]Oh yeah
Boot up
You get the GUI out front
Hottest styles, every theme, every color
Yeah, when you’re root it can be kinda fun
As long as your password is never discovered
In some ways you’re just like all your friends
But on the internetz you’re a star

You get the best of both OS’s
Run Windows, take it slow
Then Linux rocks out the show
You get the best of both OS’s
Mix it all together and you know that it’s the best of both OS’s
The best of both OS’s
You go to software premiers (is that Linus Torvalds?)
Hear songs on Pandora radio
Bootin’ two OS’s is a little weird (yeah)
But tech support’s cool cuz nobody knows
Yeah you get to be a Windows loser
But big time when you sudo

You get the best of both OS’s
Run Windows, take it slow
Then Linux rocks out the show
You get the best of both OS’s
Mix it all together and you know that it’s the best of both
(You know the best) You know the best of both OS’s
Pictures and videos
You get your face in all the social networks
The best parts that you get to run whatever software you wanna run
Yeah the best of both
You get the best of both
Come on best of both
Who would of thought that a loser like me
Would double as a Linux rock star

You get the best of both OS’s
Run Windows, take it slow
Then Linux rocks out the show
You get the best of both OS’s
Mix it all together and you know that it’s the best,
You get the best of both OS’s
Without the viruses and malware
You can surf anywhere
You get the best of both systems
Mix it all together
Oh yeah
It’s so much better cuz you know you’ve got the best of both OS’s[/code]

Read full topic

What you need is this ultra light weight, and tastefully themed GNU/Linux distro.

item.title: Operating systems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Windows 8 lowered the minimum requirements to 1GB of memory (relative to Windows 7), but I don’t think it’ll help with his problem.

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote]

OS X != Freedom.[/quote]

neither are windows and most linux and bsd distros. i use os x because it’s my favorite environment to work in.

item.title: Operating systems
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Alright, I’ll talk to him and see if he wants a new machine or more memory, Thanks guys

[quote=“Jmood, post:4, topic:551014”]Linux would use less resources to start with, but the problem is he only has one gb of memory. if this is an older machine you can either upgrade the memory which would be quite cheap these days or just buy a new machine that will most likely have a million times more memory than the one he has now.

inb4silab

downloadmoreram.com[/quote]

At one point he had 4gb and windows 8. But he got a new pc and his old one was kicked around his house… And he had to rebuild it.

Read full topic

item.title: Operating systems
item.dc:creator: @rmark45matsu rmark45matsu
item.description:
@rmark45matsu wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:1, topic:551014”]Hey guys, So my friend with the processor wants to know if Windows 8 Will run faster then Windows vista Home Premium…
Personally i like windows 7 but he wants windows 8… He said “Everytime I try to run skype and a game at the same time. It lags really bad, And at some points it just freezes.” At the moment he only has 1gb of ram. What would be a faster op system?

[spoiler]And i swear if one of you say windows xp, I’ll kill you[/spoiler][/quote]

Yes windows 8 will run faster than Vista, but with 1GB of ram there’s not a chance in hell he’ll be able to run windows 8 smoothly. I’d go out on a limb and says windows 7 wouldn’t be a smooth experience as well. As another user said above windows XP or Vista would be his best bet if he’s not willing to throw a couple of bucks at his system.

Read full topic
